languages.text: "Я был отроком, когда хворь поразила наши каюты. За лихорадкой шла кровавая рвота, и человек таял, как свечка. Выжили только самые младшие, в том числе и я". {n}Адальберт слабо улыбается.{/n} "Но теперь моя семья растет, и я благодарен за каждую новую жизнь взамен потерянной".

"I was scarcely more than a child when the malady struck our cabins. First would come the fever, then the unlucky victim would start retching blood. After that, they would melt away like a candle. Only the youngest survived, myself among them." {n}He smiles feebly.{/n} "But now my family is growing, and I am grateful for each new life that replaces one lost."
languages.original_text: "Я был отроком, когда хворь поразила наши каюты. За лихорадкой шла кровавая рвота, и человек таял, как свечка. Выжили только самые младшие, в том числе и я". {n}Адальберт слабо улыбается.{/n} "Но теперь моя семья растет, и я благодарен за каждую новую жизнь взамен потерянной".

Only the youngest survived, myself among them." {n}Adalbert smiles feebly.{/n} "But now my family is growing, and I am grateful for each new life that replaces a lost one."

Only the youngest survived, myself among them." {n}Adalbert smiles feebly.{/n} "But now my family is growing, and I am grateful for each new life that replaces one lost."

Only the youngest survived, myself among them." {n}He smiles feebly.{/n} "But now my family is growing, and I am grateful for each new life that replaces one lost."

Only the youngest survived, myself among them." {n}He smiles feebly.{/n} "But now my family is growing, and I am grateful for each new life that replaces one lost."

languages.text: « Je n'étais guère plus vieux qu'un enfant lorsque la maladie s'est abattue sur nos cabines. Elle se manifestait d'abord par une fièvre, puis les malheureuses victimes se mettaient à vomir du sang avant de dépérir à vue d'œil. Seuls les plus jeunes ont survécu, moi y compris. Mais à présent, ma famille s'agrandit, {n}continue-t-il avec un petit sourire,{/n} et je suis reconnaissant de chaque nouvelle vie qui remplace l'une de celles que nous avons perdues. »
languages.original_text: "I was scarcely more than a child when the malady struck our cabins. First would come the fever, then the unlucky victim would start retching blood. After that, they would melt away like a candle. Only the youngest survived, myself among them." {n}He smiles feebly.{/n} "But now my family is growing, and I am grateful for each new life that replaces one lost."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'étais guère plus vieux qu'un enfant lorsque la maladie s'est abattue sur nos cabines. Elle se manifestait d'abord par une fièvre, puis les malheureuses victimes se mettaient à vomir du sang avant de dépérir à vue d'œil. Seuls les plus jeunes ont survécu, moi y compris. Mais à présent, ma famille s'agrandit, {n}continue-t-il avec un petit sourire,{/n} et je suis reconnaissant de chaque nouvelle vie qui remplace l'une de celles que nous avons perdues. »

languages.text: «Apenas era un niño cuando la enfermedad llegó a nuestros camarotes. Primero se contraía una fiebre, luego la desafortunada víctima empezaba a vomitar sangre. Al poco, se consumía como una vela. Solo sobrevivieron los más jóvenes, yo entre ellos». {n}Esboza una débil sonrisa.{/n} «Pero ahora mi familia es cada vez más numerosa, y doy gracias por cada nueva vida que sustituye a la anterior».
languages.original_text: "I was scarcely more than a child when the malady struck our cabins. First would come the fever, then the unlucky victim would start retching blood. After that, they would melt away like a candle. Only the youngest survived, myself among them." {n}He smiles feebly.{/n} "But now my family is growing, and I am grateful for each new life that replaces one lost."

traits.locale_text: «Apenas era un niño cuando la enfermedad llegó a nuestros camarotes. Primero se contraía una fiebre, luego la desafortunada víctima empezaba a vomitar sangre. Al poco, se consumía como una vela. Solo sobrevivieron los más jóvenes, yo entre ellos». {n}Esboza una débil sonrisa.{/n} «Pero ahora mi familia es cada vez más numerosa, y doy gracias por cada nueva vida que sustituye a la anterior».

languages.text: “当我只是个孩子的时候，我的氏族感染了恶疾。那些可怜的病人先是发烧，之后开始吐血。在那之后，被感染的人就会像蜡烛一样融化。只有那些最幼小的成员存活了下来，而我正是其中之一。”{n}他无力地笑了起来。{/n}“但现在，我的氏族正在茁壮成长，新的生命接替了那些逝去的人们。我对此十分感激。”
languages.original_text: "I was scarcely more than a child when the malady struck our cabins. First would come the fever, then the unlucky victim would start retching blood. After that, they would melt away like a candle. Only the youngest survived, myself among them." {n}He smiles feebly.{/n} "But now my family is growing, and I am grateful for each new life that replaces one lost."

traits.locale_text: “当我只是个孩子的时候，我的氏族感染了恶疾。那些可怜的病人先是发烧，之后开始吐血。在那之后，被感染的人就会像蜡烛一样融化。只有那些最幼小的成员存活了下来，而我正是其中之一。”{n}他无力地笑了起来。{/n}“但现在，我的氏族正在茁壮成长，新的生命接替了那些逝去的人们。我对此十分感激。”

languages.text: 「この病気が私たちのキャビンを襲ったとき、私はまだ子供でした。まず熱が出て、不運な者は血を吐き始める。その後、ろうそくのように溶けてなくなるんです。生き残ったのは一番若い者だけでした。私もその内の一人です」 {n}彼は弱々しく微笑んだ。{/n} 「でも今は家族が増え、失った命の代わりに新しい命が生まれれている。その度に私は感謝しています」
languages.original_text: "I was scarcely more than a child when the malady struck our cabins. First would come the fever, then the unlucky victim would start retching blood. After that, they would melt away like a candle. Only the youngest survived, myself among them." {n}He smiles feebly.{/n} "But now my family is growing, and I am grateful for each new life that replaces one lost."

traits.locale_text: 「この病気が私たちのキャビンを襲ったとき、私はまだ子供でした。まず熱が出て、不運な者は血を吐き始める。その後、ろうそくのように溶けてなくなるんです。生き残ったのは一番若い者だけでした。私もその内の一人です」 {n}彼は弱々しく微笑んだ。{/n} 「でも今は家族が増え、失った命の代わりに新しい命が生まれれている。その度に私は感謝しています」

languages.text: "Ich war noch fast ein Kind, als die Krankheit unsere Kabinen heimgesucht hat. Zuerst kam das Fieber, dann haben die unglückseligen Opfer Blut gespuckt. Danach sind sie einfach weggeschmolzen wie eine Kerze. Nur die Jüngsten haben überlebt, darunter auch ich." {n}Er lächelt schwach.{/n} "Doch nun wächst meine Familie, und ich bin dankbar für jedes neue Leben, das ein verlorenes ersetzt."
languages.original_text: "I was scarcely more than a child when the malady struck our cabins. First would come the fever, then the unlucky victim would start retching blood. After that, they would melt away like a candle. Only the youngest survived, myself among them." {n}He smiles feebly.{/n} "But now my family is growing, and I am grateful for each new life that replaces one lost."

traits.locale_text: "Ich war noch fast ein Kind, als die Krankheit unsere Kabinen heimgesucht hat. Zuerst kam das Fieber, dann haben die unglückseligen Opfer Blut gespuckt. Danach sind sie einfach weggeschmolzen wie eine Kerze. Nur die Jüngsten haben überlebt, darunter auch ich." {n}Er lächelt schwach.{/n} "Doch nun wächst meine Familie, und ich bin dankbar für jedes neue Leben, das ein verlorenes ersetzt."

languages.text: "Kabinlerimizde salgın başgösterdiğinde hâlâ bir çocuk sayılırdım. Önce ateş bastırıyor, ardından talihsiz kurban kan kusmaya başlıyordu. Arkasından da bir mum misali eriyordu. Yalnızca en genç olanlar hayatta kaldı ve ben de onların arasındaydım." {n}Kuvvetsizce gülümsüyor.{/n} "Ama şimdi ailem giderek büyüyor ve kaybettiğim yaşamların yerini alan her bir yeni yaşam için şükrediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I was scarcely more than a child when the malady struck our cabins. First would come the fever, then the unlucky victim would start retching blood. After that, they would melt away like a candle. Only the youngest survived, myself among them." {n}He smiles feebly.{/n} "But now my family is growing, and I am grateful for each new life that replaces one lost."
